directions: Bring water to a boil in a saucepan. Stir in jalapeno; cook for 2 minutes. Add ramen noodles with seasoning packet and mushrooms. Cook until noodles are tender, about 5 minutes.
Ladle noodle mixture into a bowl; garnish with lime juice, green onion, cilantro, garlic chile paste, and sesame oil.
title: Superfast Asian Noodle Bowl for 1
